Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel

Class RedCardSlot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedCardSlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CardSlot
public class RedCardSlot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
RedCardSlot Class contains attributes and methods defining a Development Card slot in the user's View.

Attributes:

  • int "levelOccupied": number of cards stored in the slot
  • RedDevelopmentCard[] "cards": Development Cards stored in the slot
See Also:
